title: Lowest High-Technology Exports
description: In 2022, Belize had one of the lowest high-technology exports in the world, valued at just 17 US dollars.

title: Lowest Percentage of High-Technology Exports
description: In 2022, high-technology exports made up only 0.00018% of Belize's manufactured exports, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Low Number of Children Living with HIV
description: As of 2022, Belize had a relatively low number of children aged 0-14 living with HIV, totaling 100.

title: Public Private Partnerships in ICT
description: In 2019, Belize had a public private partnership investment in ICT amounting to 8.6 million US dollars.
